data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Valencia to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Valencia, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Valencia, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 1,949,794 people in the county of Valencia who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Lord, make the 41,238 believers in Valencia to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,534,162 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sagunto
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sagunto, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Valencia, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,534,162 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Valencia, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Valencia to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
